Name: Beirut
Description: The capital and largest city of Lebanon, known for its vibrant culture, historic sites, and cosmopolitan atmosphere.

Name: Mount Lebanon
Description: A mountainous region surrounding Beirut, known for its natural beauty, ski resorts, and historical towns.

Name: North Governorate
Description: A northern region of Lebanon, known for its historic sites, including the ancient city of Tripoli and the Qadisha Valley.

Name: South Governorate
Description: A southern region of Lebanon, known for its rich history, including ancient ruins and the city of Sidon.

Name: Beqaa Valley
Description: A fertile region in eastern Lebanon, known for its agriculture, vineyards, and the ancient ruins of Baalbek.

Name: Nabatieh
Description: A southern region of Lebanon, known for its agricultural land, the city of Nabatieh, and proximity to the Israeli border.
